body.name: Mygatti 2 Pack 16/2 Speaker Flat Wire Cable with Banana Tip Plugs 4 FT, UL CL3 Rated, 16 Gauge AWG Wire, Tinned OFC Copper, Transparent Jacket with Yellow Polarity Marker, for Indoor & Outdoor, Hi-Fi
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 12 hrs 55 mins
features: 【Tinned OFC Copper Conductor】: Mygatti speaker wire features ultra-high 16awg tinned copper 2 conductors. In fact, it is more durable than pure copper and performance far superior to CCA (Copper Clad Aluminum). OFC cables can provide higher clarity and sound accuracy, with higher conductivity, thereby delivering more current to the amplifier and ensuring your Hi-Fi surround sound quality.

【Gold-Plated Plugs and Flat Cable】: 24K Gold-plated double banana-tip plugs can resist corrosion and reduce discoloration, providing you with stable and tight connection. The unique flat cable shape enables simpler and safer installation. You can easily and seamlessly extend the cable along walls, edges, or corners, and even slide it under the carpet, making it completely invisible.

【UL CL3 Rated for Direct Burial】The Mygatti Pro series speaker wire with banana plugs is ideal for indoor, outdoor or in wall installation, directly buried underground or used in conduits. When connecting speakers to an A/V receiver or amplifier using this Myagtti Professional series speaker cable, it ensures the highest safety standards are achieved.

【Polarity Differentiation Design】: 16 Gauge speaker wire with banana tips come with a soft transparent jacket and yellow polarity marker. In addition, polarity can also be distinguished by the color of the connector, with red banana tip is positive and black banana tip is negative. Suitable for professional stage speakers, A/V receiver, speaker applications, stage monitors, passive speakers, home stereo sound systems, subwoofers and more.

【A Great Choice for You】: The use of high-quality components for this cable makes it far superior to other inexpensive cables, and it will always maintain good performance. If you have any questions about our product, please feel free to contact with our reliable customer service, we will reply you within 24 hours.
body.description: UL CL3 Rated 16AWG Speaker Wire with Banana Plugs Mygatti speaker wire features ultra-high 16awg tinned copper 2 conductors. In fact, it is more durable than pure copper. OFC cables can provide higher clarity and sound accuracy, with higher conductivity, thereby delivering more current to the amplifier and ensuring your Hi-Fi sound quality. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Short for my needs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome speaker wire
reviews.reviewText: I was able to use this for my living room. I had to splice the wires from my speaker to this, but it all worked great and everything sounds really good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice wires but banana plugs loosen too easily
reviews.reviewText: Make sure you twist-tighten the banana plugs as hard as possible before installing… they tend to come loose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to replace a more high end set; I need a longer length. The connection is better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more Static
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a set of speakers and ordered these for a SUPER connection. I could have made something similar but has the time?Alittle pricey but worth it. I would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sounding cable.
reviews.reviewText: Used this to connect a second subwoofer; great sound, quality. Comparable if not better than other brands regardless of price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent cables with multiple irritations
reviews.reviewText: These cables are in place and are working just fine with my surround speakers. However, there are a number of things I dislike:1. Despite the description, these are NOT flat cables. They are thinner than most, but I've had flat cables, and these aren't them.2. The banana plugs are so fat I had to crimp them with pliers before they would fit into any speaker terminals.3. Each cable is sharply folded back on itself to form the coils they're packaged in. The fold is strong enough to deform the cable permanently, almost certainly creating a weak spot that could eventually lead to failure.4. The connector collars are loose and unscrew if you look at them funny. 6 of the 8 collars were loose in the package when the cables arrived.As I said, these cables are working just fine, but considering the issues I've noted I wouldn't buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great spool of 16 gauge speaker wire. I wanted to redo some of my wires in my living room surround sound as the old stuff just got worn and frayed over the years. Really good and thick covering over tinned copper which helps the audio quality. Honestly some of the best speaker wire I've used and really great for the overall cost with a 50ft roll being about $22 as of review time.
